N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 475.2 - Termination of services during probationary period

State Regulations
(a) If a probationary member's conduct, performance, physical condition, or health is unsatisfactory during the
probationary period, the superintendent may terminate the probationary member's
employment. (b) The superintendent
will give a probationary member notice of impending termination one week before
its effective date. In lieu of this notice, the superintendent may compensate
the probationary member with an amount equal to one week of the probationary
member's salary. The superintendent will not give notice, nor grant any
payment, to a probationary member whose employment is terminated for
misconduct. Notes
